titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 200th anniversary of "The Star-Spangled Banner".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
9/16/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the period from September 2014 through September 2015 as the Year of National Thanksgiving for The Star-Spangled Banner.
Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Star-Spangled Banner shall retain all current verses and remain our national anthem in perpetuity.
